title: HOW TO PLAY ROTATING GAME QUEUE ON NEW CLIENT
body: It should be on now since its friday and I dont see any option to play asention.

replies.body:
Rotating games are not currently enabled on the new client.  You can return to the legacy client in the meantime though:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
Yeah one of my friends told me how to fix it.  But thanks anyway for the constant help.  And when will it be available for the new client?
So, when IS the new client expected to have rotating game modes enabled?
